comments:
Running build from HEAD today.

I'm getting a NPE whenever I select something in the Java Editor for an entity that I refactored.

The problem is that Entity#getPersistenceProject() returns null for this entity. The entity was initially created using the "Generate Entities..." wizard. The name of the generated entity was "Gcatalog". I used the Java refactoring wizard to rename the generated class to "Catalog". After that I got exceptions in the Persistence properties view whenever I selected something in the Java editor in this class.

Error

FYI, I've opened bug 136333 as an enhancement request for tracking rename refactorings. This bug should make the persistence properties view and model fail safe for entities with a missing table association.

Created new bug with more basic cause of problem.
Marking this bug as duplicate of that one.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 143306 ***
Closing as part of mass query to clean up old resolved bugs in untargetted milestones.
